    • Method Detail

      • assertHeaders

        protected static void assertHeaders​(org.apache.http.Header[] defaultHeaders,
                                    org.apache.http.Header[] requestHeaders,
                                    org.apache.http.Header[] actualHeaders,
                                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> ignoreHeaders)
        Assert that the actual headers are the expected ones given the original default and request headers. Some headers can be ignored, for instance in case the http client is adding its own automatically.
        Parameters:
        defaultHeaders - the default headers set to the REST client instance
        requestHeaders - the request headers sent with a particular request
        actualHeaders - the actual headers as a result of the provided default and request headers
        ignoreHeaders - header keys to be ignored as they are not part of default nor request headers, yet they will be part of the actual ones
